attributes.action: allow ALL Gurkha soldiers who have ever served the British Crown to remain,with their families, in this Country should they wish to do so
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK Govt. seeks to limit the rights of residence only to those serving / retiring after 1977 - others will have to appeal to remain in the UK. This is demeaning and unjust. Gurkha soldiers have given unique, long & loyal service to the British Crown which we should recognise and reward by the simple grant of residency rights to ALL of them and their families who want to stay.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
